newstate.name: NewState
newstate.text: You can appoint one of your characters to be this state's Elector.

transit.name: transit
transit.tooltip: This character is returning from duty.||They will not available for assignment until the start of the next turn.

wounded.name: wounded
wounded.tooltip: This character is wounded and convalescing.

not_owned.name: not_owned
not_owned.text: You cannot assign an Elector Count until you own the state's capital.

owned.name: owned
owned.text: There are currently no eligible candidates.
